title: How to design category tiles for the Service Portal
content:
The category tiles on the Service Portal home page can be comprised of several graphic designs. It's recommended to mix and match these designs for an interesting and attractive look. You can use available background images and solid background colors.

To access the category settings, from the main menu, select Plan > Service Catalog > Categories. 

The settings are per category so you must enter each category and expand the Category display settings.

Note 
Setting default open tab per category isn't supported. If your suite is upgraded from previous version, tenant admin may need to manually remove the Default open tab field in your category form if you still see this field in the UI. You may set default open tab for all categories through Service Portal Settings > Feature Settings > Category page type.
  1. Set the background by selecting one of the following:

    • Select Background image per category from the drop-down list. You can choose from the available category background images.

    • Set Background color per category. Make sure the Background image field is clear and enter an RGB number or click to open the color selector.

    • Set Background color with an Image icon. Make sure the Background image field is clear and select one of the background colors from the drop-down list. Click Upload image to select an icon to use for the category. You can use one of the icons supplied in the downloadable sample images pack available from the Service Portal Settings page. It's highly recommended to use a white image icon.

    • Use the Default category background. If no background image or background color is selected, default color is selected

    • It's highly recommended that you mix and match the different category background styles. The recommended ratio is 3:2:1 per the details in the following table:

      Option 1 Option 2
      3 solid color tiles using different colors 3 solid color tiles using different colors

      2 background images

      2 default color tiles which are usually a darker color

      1 default color tile which is usually a darker color

      		 1 background image

  2. You have the option to enter a URL in the URL field and this category links to that site. This must be a category that doesn't include a service or offering. The category appears in the portal and links to the URL you enter. For example, you can link to an external ticketing system.

  3. Set the Display order of the category as it appears in the portal.

Click Save and refresh the Service Portal page to view the results of your selections.
